title: PtC Blended Finance Data Standard Schema

id.description: A globally unique identifier for this organisation. This is important to enable data on funders and recipients to be linked up across different grant-makers. The [Organisation Identifier Standard](http://www.threesixtygiving.org/standard/identifiers/#toc-organisation-identifier) guidance explains how to create this ID, based either on the known company or charity number, or upon identifiers held in the grant-maker's internal systems.
id.title: Identifier

department.description: The department or sub-unit of this organisation making or receiving the grant.
department.title: Department

contactName.description: The contact person at this organisation.
contactName.title: Contact Name

companyNumber.description: Registered UK company number, if applicable.
companyNumber.title: Company Number

postalCode.description: Postal code (please try and provide a post code whenever possible)
postalCode.title: Postal Code

alternateName.description: An alternative name for this organisation (e.g. trading name)
alternateName.title: Alternate Name

email.description: The email address for this organisation.
email.title: Email

description.description: A short description of this organisation and its area of work
description.title: Description

url.description: A web address for the Organisation
url.title: Web Address

dateModified.description: The date and time when information about this organisation was last updated.
dateModified.title: Last modified

countryCode.description: The ISO Country Code of the location of this activity.
countryCode.title: Country Code

description.description: A description of this location. This could include details of the element of the activity that takes place here.
description.title: Description

geoCode.description: A code referring to a geographical area, drawn from an established gazetteer. For example, the code for a local authority ward, or parliamentary constituency.
geoCode.title: Geographic Code

geoCodeType.description: The type of Geographic Code (geoCode) used (e.g. Ward, Parliamentary Constituency etc.). This value for this field should be drawn from the [codelist of geographic code types](https://github.com/ThreeSixtyGiving/standard/tree/master/codelists/geoCodeType.csv).
geoCodeType.title: Geographic Code Type

dateModified.description: The date and time when information about this location was last updated.
dateModified.title: Last modified

Grant.description: A grant in a blended finance deal.
Grant.title: Grant

id.description: The unique identifier for this grant. Made up of your 360Giving prefix, and an identifier from your records. See the [360Giving Grant identifier guidance](http://www.threesixtygiving.org/standard/identifiers/#toc-grant-identifier) for details.
id.title: Identifier

amountAwarded.description: Total amount awarded in numbers (do not include commas or currency symbols such as £). If you have provided detailed transaction information on a separate table, this should equal the sum of all the award transactions for this grant.
amountAwarded.title: Amount Awarded

amountDisbursed.description: Total amount disbursed (paid) to this grantee when this record was last updated (in numbers: do not include commas or currency symbols such as £)). If you have provided detailed transaction information on a separate table, this should equal the sum of all the disbursement transactions for this grant.
amountDisbursed.title: Amount Disbursed

ShareIssue.description: A share issue within a blended finance deal
ShareIssue.title: shareIssue

id.description: The unique identifier for this share issue. Made up of your 360Giving prefix, and an identifier from your records. See the [360Giving Grant identifier guidance](http://www.threesixtygiving.org/standard/identifiers/#toc-grant-identifier) for details.
id.title: Identifier

status.description: The current status of the share issue.
status.title: Status

matchFundingAmountAwarded.description: Total match-funding amount awarded in numbers (do not include commas or currency symbols such as £). If you have provided detailed transaction information on a separate table, this should equal the sum of all the award transactions for this grant.
matchFundingAmountAwarded.title: Match Funding Amount Awarded

raiseTarget.description: Total share-raising target, including any matched-funding contribution.
raiseTarget.title: Raise Target

amountRaised.description: Total amount raised in a completed share offer
amountRaised.title: Amount Raised

Loan.description: A loan within a blended finance deal
Loan.title: Loan

id.description: The unique identifier for this loan. Made up of your 360Giving prefix, and an identifier from your records. See the [360Giving Grant identifier guidance](http://www.threesixtygiving.org/standard/identifiers/#toc-grant-identifier) for details.
id.title: Identifier

amountAwarded.description: Total loan amount awarded in numbers (do not include commas or currency symbols such as £). If you have provided detailed transaction information on a separate table, this should equal the sum of all the award transactions for this grant.
amountAwarded.title: Amount Awarded

term.description: The term of the loan in months
term.title: Term Months

Project.description: The project associated with this blended finance deal.
Project.title: Project

id.description: The unique identifier for this project. Made up of your 360Giving prefix, and an identifier from your records. See the [360Giving Grant identifier guidance](http://www.threesixtygiving.org/standard/identifiers/#toc-grant-identifier) for details.
id.title: Identifier

title.description: A title for this project. This should be under 140 characters long.
title.title: Title

description.description: A short description of this project.
description.title: Description

id.description: The unique identifier for this deal. Made up of your 360Giving prefix, and an identifier from your records. See the [360Giving Grant identifier guidance](http://www.threesixtygiving.org/standard/identifiers/#toc-grant-identifier) for details.
id.title: Deal:Identifier

title.description: A title for this deal activity. This should be under 140 characters long.
title.title: Deal:Title

description.description: A short description of this deal activity.
description.title: Deal:Description

recipientOrganization.title: Recipient Org
recipientOrganization.description: Details of the recipient of this deal.

grant.description: A grant within a blended finance deal
grant.title: Grant

loan.description: A loan within a blended finance deal
loan.title: Loan

shareIssue.description: A share issue in a blended finance deal
shareIssue.title: Share Issue

project.description: A project associated with a blended finance deal
project.title: Project
